actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution providing for the further expenses of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce for the 2nd Session of the 95th Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes expenditures, not exceed $4,540.09, for the further expenses of investigations and studies conducted by the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce during the second session of the 95th Congress. Prohibits the use of any part of such funds in connection with the study or investigation of any subject being investigated for the same purpose by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the further expenses of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce for the 2nd Session of the 95th Congress.
